snippet: Airbus and Boeing are pressuring a French supplier, Zodiac Aerospace, over persistent delays in the delivery of aircraft seats that are disrupting jetliner assembly.
abstract: Zodiac Aerospace is being pressured by Airbus and Boeing due to persistent delays in delivering aircraft seats; company has blamed overloaded engineering resources for production delays.
lead_paragraph: Airbus and Boeing are pressuring a French supplier, Zodiac Aerospace, over persistent delays in the delivery of aircraft seats that are disrupting jetliner assembly.

headline.main: Airbus and Boeing Pressure Seats Maker Over Delays
headline.print_headline: Airbus and Boeing Pressure Seats Maker Over Delays
